First, I should understand what defines a non-violent person in this context. From the examples given, it seems that anyone who doesn't engage in violent acts is considered non-violent. So, if someone throws a punch or uses force, they are deemed violent.

Looking at the scenario: Betty tried to calm down the argument by lowering the temperature, but Christopher reacted by throwing a punch. After that, Betty had to call the police. This indicates that Christopher was the one who used physical force (the punch), which suggests he is the violent one.
